tool.name: SAGA.table_tools.10
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTABLE False isArrayFIELD False isArrayREPLACE False output_data_OUT_TABLE $output_data_OUT_TABLE output_data_OUT_SHAPES $output_data_OUT_SHAPES name SAGA.table_tools.10 TABLE $TABLE FIELD $FIELD REPLACE $REPLACE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUT_TABLE $OutputSection_OUT_TABLE.outputType_OUT_TABLE transmissionMode_OUT_TABLE $OutputSection_OUT_TABLE.transmissionMode_OUT_TABLE outputType_OUT_SHAPES $OutputSection_OUT_SHAPES.outputType_OUT_SHAPES transmissionMode_OUT_SHAPES $OutputSection_OUT_SHAPES.transmissionMode_OUT_SHAPES

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Table
param.help: Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Attribute
param.help: Attribute The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: REPLACE
param.label: Text Replacements
param.help: Text Replacements The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUT_TABLE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_OUT_TABLE
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_OUT_SHAPES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_OUT_SHAPES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: For the selected attribute or, if not specified, for all text attributes this tool replaces text strings with replacements as defined in table 'Text Replacements'.
